item.title: Species Distribution Modeling with HMSC
item.description: #TODO where did I get the Data from? Intro text To run this code you will need to install the pacman R package beforehand but this will take care of all the other packages required. pacman::p_load(abind, data.table, ggplot2, here, Hmsc, magrittr)
